modName: Dragon Priest Masks - Better Sorting Style
summary: Changes Dragon Priest Mask names to match Better Sorting by Headbomb\'s Style
descriptionHtml:
Changes the names of all the Dragon Priest Mask\'s (including the Wooden one) to match [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730]Headbomb\'s Better Sorting[/url] style.

Masks are now named [b]Dragon Priest Mask - Name[/b], where \"Name\" is the name of the Priest in question, or Wooden as the case may be. Only changes the name so should be compatible with things that tweak the effects of the masks. Worst case you may need a Bash Patch.

I highly recommend using the aforementioned [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730]Better Sorting by Headbomb[/url] as well as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863]SkyUI[/url] (as seen in the screenshot). Skyrim without both is, imo, an Unplayable Quagmire of Console Crap.

[b][u]Installation Instructions:[/b][/u]
Click the Download Button and then pick the version you want!
If you download it manually, simply extract it to the Data folder of Skyrim.

[b][u]Changelog:[/u][/b]
v1.0: Initial Releade
v1.1: Typo Fixed

[b][u]Credits:[/b][/u]
[b]Bethesda - [/b]For making the best open world games ever made.
[b]Mountain Dew - [/b]For being so tasty.

[b][u]My Mods[/b][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10847]Barbarian Perk Tweak aka More Two Handed Damage[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10905]Merchants only reply with Take a Look[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7892]Nighteye Muted or Quieter Sound[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11119]More Firewood per Chop[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11414]Disable Fast Travel Permanently[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11684]Bonus Damage Perks affect all Weapons[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12356]Dragon Priest Masks - Better Sorting Style[/url]
author: The Great and Powerful BaconCat
